p: Hyssop herb ( Hyssopi herba) and its pharmaceutical preparations (infusions, syrups, tinctures, extracts) have been used in traditional medicine since ancient times as antiseptic, carminative, diaphoretic, emenagogue, expectorant, muscle relaxant, stomachic and tonic agents. As an aromatic plant, it is also used in the food and cosmetics industry [ 4, 5, 6].
